description: Our basic facial, perfect for those who are new to luxury skincare services or aren't sure what types of products will benefit their skin.
For returning clients only. A facial customized to your skincare needs.
A full brow shaping, including a consultation, waxing, trimming, and tweezing.
For dying brows to either make fine hairs stand out more, or to match hair color. Lasts 4-6 weeks. This service includes brow shaping.
A 60 minute full body massage with your choice of scented massage oils.
A 90 minute full body massage with your choice of scented massage oils.
A single color gel polish manicure that is made to last! Art can be added on, please call for assistance.
